director.name: 丹尼斯·斯科沃尔佐夫 Denis Skvortsov

introduction: Young ambitious programmer Alexey Kuzmenkov suffers professional failure and makes a paradoxical decision - despite the deferment, to join the army. However, while serving, Alexey makes a complete “reset” of his entire life. He gives up illusions about easy victories and quick achievements, overcomes his own weaknesses and temptations, meets reliable and loyal friends, becomes a real man and opens up new prospects for his own life.The film was shot for the 100th anniversary of the Armed Forces of the Republic of Belarus.Filming took place in Minsk, on the “Stalin Line”, the Mound of Glory, and in the military town in Pechi.Especially for filming at Belarusfilm, they created a full-size model of the 1933 Soviet tank T-26.
